text: Jab Isa ne mehsoos kiya ke bani Israel kufr o inkar par aamaada hain to usne kaha “kaun Allah ki raah mein mera madadgaar hota hai?” Hawariyon (desciples) ne jawab diya, “hum Allah ke madadgaar hain, hum Allah par iman laye, gawah raho ke hum muslim (Allah ke aagey sar itaat jhuka dene waley) hain
